text:
Al Ahly Sporting Club (Egyptian pronunciation:) commonly known as Al Ahly () is an Egyptian sporting club. Founded in April 1907, they were named in 2000 by the Confederation of African Football as the "African Club of the Century".
Al Ahly has 108 official trophies (99 domestic and 9 international). This makes them the 3rd most successful football club in the world.
